abstract: The appointment will put to use Richard D. Parsons’s ties to the Obama administration as well as his experience in running companies under a federal microscope.
snippet: The appointment will put to use Richard D. Parsons’s ties to the Obama administration as well as his experience in running companies under a federal microscope.
lead_paragraph: Richard D. Parsons swatted down talk last November that he might become the chairman of Citigroup, the struggling financial giant. “I have every confidence that we have the right team on the field to pull this thing out,” Mr. Parsons, then chairman of Time Warner and a Citigroup director, said in an interview with CNBC.

headline.main: Parsons Is Named Chairman of Citigroup
headline.print_headline: Parsons Is Named Chairman Of Citigroup

headline.main: In Parsons, Citi Gets Chairman and Diplomat
